title: Application Profile Specification Document
description: An Application Profile Specification Document contains human-readable version of an Application Profile.

title.title: title
title.description: A name given to the Data Specification Document.

description.title: description
description.description: An account of the Data Specification Document.

conformsTo.title: conforms To
conformsTo.description: An established standard to which the described resource conforms.

format.title: format
format.description: The file format, physical medium, or dimensions of the resource.

hasRole.title: has role
hasRole.description: The function of an artifact described by a Resource Descriptor, such as specification, guidance etc.

hasArtifact.title: has artifact
hasArtifact.description: The URL of a downloadable file with particulars such as its format and role indicated by the Resource Descriptor

inSpecificationOf.title: Konceptuální model
inSpecificationOf.description: Konceptuální model obsahující profily tříd a vlastností různých slovníků.

title.title: title
title.description: A name given to the Semantic Data Specification.

description.title: description
description.description: An account of the Semantic Data Specification.

hasToken.title: has token
hasToken.description: The preferred identifier for the Profile, for use in circumstances where its URI cannot be used

isProfileOf.title: is profile of
isProfileOf.description: A specification for which this Profile defines constraints, extensions, or which it uses in combination with other specifications, or provides guidance or explanation about its usage

items.title: Semantic Data Specification
items.description:
A specification that constrains, extends, combines, or provides guidance or explanation about the usage of other specifications.

This definition includes what are often called "application profiles", "metadata application profiles", or "metadata profiles".

title.title: title
title.description: A name given to the Semantic Data Specification.

hasResource.title: has resource
hasResource.description: A resource which describes the nature of an artifact and the role it plays in relation to the Profile

items.title: Resource Descriptor
items.description: A description of a resource that defines an aspect - a particular part, feature or role - of a Profile
